title: 你们学校唱我和我的祖国了吗?
author: chuangshigame

replies.txt_content: 唱了啊  国庆晚会就唱了

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content: 没有，我们唱《义勇军进行曲》和《少年少年祖国的春天》，。。。。

replies.author: Оil
replies.txt_content:
没有唱。

什么东西？= =？

replies.author: miniwiki
replies.txt_content: 没有，我在放假

replies.author: 坑触可
replies.txt_content: 没有这回事的说

replies.author: 李噬恶
replies.txt_content: 要唱啊啊啊，超烦

replies.author: 紅月阿
replies.txt_content: 军训的小朋友们唱了

replies.author: 卫斯李
replies.txt_content: 上班族表示不服,还没中秋舒服

replies.author: xiang_xge
replies.txt_content: 国庆晚会是啥？？

replies.author: cy59110172
replies.txt_content: 原来不是我们一个学校唱啊

replies.author: 极影Sama
replies.txt_content: 我们没有唱，但是我看b站和抖音很多人都在唱

replies.author: ljh221
replies.txt_content: 日常唱这个，刚军训完，早上就唱过

replies.author: 世予予

replies.author: 余音是只猫
replies.txt_content: 我们唱七子之歌咦

replies.author: 快乐小方
replies.txt_content:
当然唱了，
快被洗.脑了

五星红旗迎风飘扬~胜利歌声多么响亮~歌唱我们亲爱的祖国~

replies.author: 无尽黎明
replies.txt_content: 感觉这首歌很好听的啊

replies.author: Aikini
replies.txt_content: 这调子都差不多听到**了qwq

replies.txt_content: 当升旗仪式观众都要抢名额

replies.author: 西柠
replies.txt_content: 我们学校铃声就是这个

replies.author: a6513375
replies.txt_content: 没唱...我们啥都没唱...

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 没空，在学习

replies.author: mohist
replies.txt_content: 没有唱，照常上课

replies.txt_content: 办公室外面的学生经常唱……
